attributes.action: Remove pay and display parking zones from Brighton and Hove.
attributes.additional_details: Recently Brighton and Hove have been aggressively creating new areas of pay and display zones and permit holders only parking. This causes a knock on effect for residents in nearby areas without these zones as people are forced to park there instead. Recent areas that have had these zones placed are: Fiveways, Ditchling Road, Stanford Avenue, Preston Drove, Hollingbury Road, Coleman street, Milton Road... The aim of this petition is to force Brighton and hove to lift these parking restrictions.
attributes.background: Brighton and hove council in their infinite wisdom have decided to expand pay and display zones while also expanding permit holders only parking spaces. This has affected local businesses and working people the hardest.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://present.brighton-hove.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
